org.spongepowered.api.event.server

Interface StatusPingEvent

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Cancellable, Event, GameEvent

    public interface StatusPingEvent
extends GameEvent, Cancellable
    Called when a client pings the server from the server list.

    If this event gets cancelled, it will close the client connection without sending any response.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static interface  StatusPingEvent.Response
      Represents a mutable response to a status request.

    • Method Summary

      Gets the client pinging the server.
      StatusPingEvent.Response getResponse()
